definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to extend New Year's greetings/to pay a New Year's visit
He Long (1896-1969), important communist military leader, died from persecution during the Cultural Revolution
Helan Mountains, lying across part of the border between Ningxia and Inner Mongolia
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes

sentences.english: Hernandez and Abbott. What about the rest?
sentences.chinese: 賀南德茲和阿巴，其他人呢？

sentences.english: Eric and EO2 did rehearsal for "Jade Singers Celebrate TVB's Anniversary".
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威與EO2爲《翡翠歌星賀臺慶》彩排。

sentences.english: Dr. He has 8 years of working experience in both China and overseas.
sentences.chinese: 賀博士有8年的國內和國外工作經驗。

sentences.english: Overture of Spring Festival is a very famous piece of Chinese instrumental m…
sentences.chinese: 春節序曲是李喚之作曲的著名賀新春樂曲。

sentences.english: Dick Hoyt and his son, Rick, prove anything is possible.
sentences.chinese: 迪克賀伊特和兒子瑞克證明了一切皆有可能。

sentences.english: How is Mr. Holmes getting along in his new job?
sentences.chinese: 賀爾姆斯先生的新工作做得怎樣？

sentences.english: How is Mr. Holmes getting August in his new job?
sentences.chinese: 賀爾姆斯男士的新任務做得怎麼？

sentences.english: Incredibly, one man stood to the side, smoking a cigarette, Härstedt remembers.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的是一個男人竟站在一邊抽著煙，賀斯特回憶。

sentences.english: Hangzhou Prefecture Yao love the poem, to crown towel, renamed Ho.
sentences.chinese: 杭州太守姚合愛其詩，加以冠巾，改名賀。

sentences.english: Celebrating the new spring we are full of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 賀新春，唱新春，說不完心中歡樂無限。

sentences.english: Wish happy wedding. Name on the card for the bride & bridegroom . Sweet Sweet.
sentences.chinese: 賀新婚之喜，可刻上一對新人名字，留住甜蜜時刻。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
